ai-tika-abh08t22:2_0: He has the gets material possessions and fame in this place. He gets the recipientment for the sake of gain, etc., from gaining material possessions, honor, and popularity.
ai-tika-abh08t22:3_0: Delicate Life is the subtlety of sensual desires,
ai-tika-abh08t22:4_0: by means of the first path, so on fortunate, and those who know about the first path should be given up the fetters, and by the others.
ai-tika-abh08t22:5_0: When you know that suffering arises dependent on yourselves and conquers, you’ll know: ‘This is suffering’ ...
ai-tika-abh08t22:6_0: Knowing this, he should practice the state of peace: “This universality, ocherous, knowing the benefit of bliss in this very life; he should know the mind and see the difference in it with a single consequence, the one who is unexplained, the state of the noble ones.” And he should practice the state of the state of Emancipation, which is unshakable.
ai-tika-abh08t22:7_0: Such is the defeat of this Dhamma.
ai-tika-abh08t22:8_0: The Description of the defilements is finished.
ai-tika-abh08t22:9_0: The group of twenty is finished.
